publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-344 Mr John Home Robertson: Sea Fishing Grants (Charges) Bill—That the Parliament accepts the need to establish the validity of charges levied by the Sea Fish Industry Authority and the Herring Industry Board as set out in the Sea Fishing Grants (Charges) Bill and agrees that the Bill should be considered by the the UK Parliament.

S1M-344 Mr John Home Robertson: Sea Fishing Grants (Charges) Bill—That the Parliament accepts the need to establish the validity of charges levied by the Sea Fish Industry Authority and the Herring Industry Board as set out in the Sea Fishing Grants (Charges) Bill and agrees that the Bill should be considered by the UK Parliament.
